dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Alliance Publication This study identifies opportunities to train CHWs more cost effectively through technology enabled multimedia content that leverages visuals videos or audio Additionally it highlights the potential to create open easily sharable digital content that could act as a crucial ingredient for new approaches to training and learning in the future May 2012

Preparing the Next Generation of Community Health Workers
